full_text: Overall, I found that there is not a clear relationship between how well a defense performs and where that same team starts their drive. #nflverse

Got some good feedback in the #nflverse discord, so I looked into this a little bit more. When using the average starting position for an offense after their defense causes a turnover or forces a punt, there seemed to be more of a correlation (R-squared = 0.116) https://t.co/fu0a2HmVz5 https://t.co/Oy7kIVdFIC
